titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring the confirmation of the treaties and continuance of the amity and commerce between the crowns of England and Portugal
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall the sixth day of October in the twelfth year of our reign, 1660."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
